title: Weird action lag/delays
body:
So every 5th or so game (sometimes consecutive games) i've been receiving a really weird delay on casting abilities (QWERDF), as well as right click movements . These delays may last between 1 second to sometimes up to 10 seconds. Not only is this annoying but does cause deaths in game which is very tilting. My ping is a constant 32, and after multiple internet resets i have ruled out my internet being the issue.

Does anyone know of a fix, or is anyone also receiving this weird lag.
chrs
